title: laap
name: laap-minced-meat-salad
shortDescription: If Laos were to nominate a national dish, a strong contender would be laap (sometimes spelled larp or lahb), a “salad” of minced meat or fish mixed with garlic, chillies, shallots, galangal, ground sticky rice and fish sauce.

reviews.note: Delicious with a bowl of rice :)
So good, but can be very spicy!!
